## utils.mouseToSvg() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use Blockly.browserEvents.mouseToSvg instead;
> 

Returns the converted coordinates of the given mouse event. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Blockly SVG.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mouseToSvg(e: Event, svg: SVGSVGElement, matrix: SVGMatrix | null): SVGPoint;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | Mouse event. |
|  svg | SVGSVGElement | SVG element. |
|  matrix | SVGMatrix \| null | Inverted screen CTM to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

SVGPoint

Object with .x and .y properties.
